name: Feel my feels
description:
Game made for Global Game Jam 2018. 

It requires Xbox One controllers in order to play. 

To move use joysticks, to "spread" your feelings to capture opponent's minions use X button. 

Description:

Transmit your feelings to others and make them your allies. Conquer the map. And destroy those who don't feel what you feel.

Game was made by: 

Adrianna Kaminska - programming

Marco Moroni - programming and game design

Stephan Aldhous - programming

Marta Vives - Art (https://www.behance.net/vischora)

Special thanks to Jamesy Downie for music :)
